bind.name: watch
instance
bind.value: isHeader ? 'StatItemHeader' : 'StatRow'; {header: header, title:title, value:value, statData: statData, hintVehicleId: hintVehicleId}

bind.name: tooltip
bind.value: 'StatsRowHint'; (tooltipName == null) ? { tooltipText: title + '_TOOLTIP', shipInfo: shipInfo, _hintVehicleId: hintVehicleId } : null

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'RankedSeasonFlag'; battleType == BattleTypes.RANKED_BATTLE ? {_curSeasonIndex: curSeasonIndex, statData: statData}: null

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'AllShipsSelectedItem'; statData.shipsList.length != 0 ? {shipListLength: statData.shipsList.length, totalWinRate: statData.diagStats.totalWinRate, battleType: battleType, currentVehicleId: statData.vehicleId, seasonId: seasonId, gamesPlayed: statData.diagStats.gamesPlayed} : null

bind.name: repeat
bind.value: shipsList; 'ShipRowItem'; {battleType: battleType, currentVehicleId: statData.vehicleId, curSeasonIndex: curSeasonIndex, seasonId: seasonId, _curItemIndex: _curItemIndex}; !(userPrefs.shipSortStatsDirection)

bind.name: child
watch
bind.value: 'rowArrayTeam'; [ { title: 'IDS_PERSONAL_STAT_POINTS_FOR_TODAY', valueLeft: format(myDailyProgressLeft), valueRight: format(myDailyProgressRight)}, { title: 'IDS_PERSONAL_STAT_BATTLES_TODAY', valueLeft: format(myDailyBattlesLeft), valueRight: format(myDailyBattlesRight)}, { title: 'IDS_PERSONAL_STAT_BATTLES_TOTAL', valueLeft: format(myTotalBattlesLeft), valueRight: format(myTotalBattlesRight)}]

bind.name: repeat
bind.value: [ 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_FRAG', 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_WIN', 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_ACHIEVEMENT', 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_HEROIC_ACHIEVEMENT', 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_PERSONAL_ORDER', ]; 'ArcEventScoreTableRowContainer'; {_data: [ [ randomBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_5, randomBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_6, randomBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_7, randomBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_8, randomBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_9, randomBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_10 ], [ randomBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_5, randomBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_6, randomBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_7, randomBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_8, randomBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_9, randomBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_10 ], [ randomBattleScoringRules.OtherAchievLvl_5, randomBattleScoringRules.OtherAchievLvl_6, randomBattleScoringRules.OtherAchievLvl_7, randomBattleScoringRules.OtherAchievLvl_8, randomBattleScoringRules.OtherAchievLvl_9, randomBattleScoringRules.OtherAchievLvl_10 ], [ randomBattleScoringRules.HeroicAchievLvl_5, randomBattleScoringRules.HeroicAchievLvl_6, randomBattleScoringRules.HeroicAchievLvl_7, randomBattleScoringRules.HeroicAchievLvl_8, randomBattleScoringRules.HeroicAchievLvl_9, randomBattleScoringRules.HeroicAchievLvl_10 ], [ randomBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_5, randomBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_6, randomBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_7, randomBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_8, randomBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_9, randomBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_10 ] ]}

bind.name: repeat
bind.value: [ 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_FRAG', 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_WIN', 'IDS_ARC_EVENT_TABLE_SCORE_PERSONAL_ORDER' ]; 'ArcEventScoreTableRowContainer'; {_data: [ [ coopBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_5, coopBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_6, coopBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_7, coopBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_8, coopBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_9, coopBattleScoringRules.FragLvl_10 ], [ coopBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_5, coopBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_6, coopBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_7, coopBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_8, coopBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_9, coopBattleScoringRules.WinLvl_10 ], [ coopBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_5, coopBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_6, coopBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_7, coopBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_8, coopBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_9, coopBattleScoringRules.IndividTasksLvl_10 ] ]}

bind.name: gotoAndStop!
bind.value: _isEmptySlot ? ('empty_slot_' + _formationType) : isInBattle ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType + postfix) : _isWardog && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : _isWardog && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isCommander && isReady ? ('commander_' + _formationType + postfix) : isCommander && !isReady ? ('commander_not_ready_' +_formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : 'empty_slot_division'
